member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.CopilotChecksumWrapper
member.summary: Exposed to provide an efficient checksum implementation. Intended usage including caching responses w/o retaining potentially long strings.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.GenerateImplementation.ImplementationDetailsWrapper
member.summary: Holds details about a replacement node, providing either a message explaining the absence of a replacement or the replacement syntax node itself. One of or must always be set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.GenerateImplementation.ImplementationDetailsWrapper.Message
member.summary: Gets the message explaining why a replacement node is not provided. Either this property or must be set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.GenerateImplementation.ImplementationDetailsWrapper.ReplacementNode
member.summary: Gets the replacement syntax node. Either this property or must be set.

member.name: T:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.Internal.Analyzer.AbstractCopilotCodeAnalysisService
member.summary: Copilot code analysis service that coordinates triggering Copilot code analysis in the background for a given document. This service caches the computed Copilot suggestion diagnostics by method body to ensure that we do not perform duplicate analysis calls. Additionally, it performs all the option checks and Copilot service availability checks to determine if we should skip analysis or not.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.Internal.Analyzer.AbstractCopilotCodeAnalysisService.#ctor(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Diagnostics.IDiagnosticsRefresher)
member.summary: Copilot code analysis service that coordinates triggering Copilot code analysis in the background for a given document. This service caches the computed Copilot suggestion diagnostics by method body to ensure that we do not perform duplicate analysis calls. Additionally, it performs all the option checks and Copilot service availability checks to determine if we should skip analysis or not.

member.name: M:Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.Copilot.Internal.SemanticSearch.CopilotSemanticSearchQueryExecutor.ResultsObserver.GetClassificationOptionsAsync(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Host.LanguageServices,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
